content.rendered:
CONSTRUCTION

From full-service general contracting to specialized historic restoration work to metal fabrication, our construction group meets a wide range of needs within the construction industry.

  • Building Materials
  • Construction
  • Real Estate
  • Automotive
  • Other

WE SWEAT THE DETAILS

Much of what you see happening during a construction project has been thought through, analyzed, and double-checked repeatedly.  Our construction businesses are known for this level of attention to detail, which has helped us to succeed these past 80 years.  Being a part of the Stewart Companies, our construction businesses work in tandem, bringing multiple talents together as a team to deliver the results our clients have come to expect.

STEWART & TATE

A full service construction firm that specializes in general building construction, site development and specialized industrial construction.

LEWIS CONTRACTORS

Lewis Contractors has an unsurpassed reputation for excellence in institutional construction and historic preservation.

RILEY WELDING & FABRICATING

A custom welding and fabricating company based in Hanover, Pennsylvania.
